title: Golnesa GG Gharachedaghi from Shahs Of Sunset
description:
“Shahs of Sunset” star Golnesa “GG” Gharachedaghi knows a thing or two about fierce, independent women! She gets real about love and marriage, polyamory, dating, and doing motherhood solo! She has tales about her IVF process and experience, giving birth during COVID, mothering Elijah, and mom-shaming. And she speaks candidly about her drug issues, rehab, and living with an autoimmune disease. Plus, Lala reveals her new tattoo in celebration of daughter, Ocean, and recounts her trip home to Salt Lake City to introduce Ocean to her Salt Lake crew.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
